title: NewsBreak: Costco Falls on Mixed Q4 Results
text:
NewsBreak: Costco Falls on Mixed Q4 Results

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Oct 03, 2019 16:50)

© Reuters. Investing.com - Costco (NASDAQ: ) fell 1% in postmarket trade after the company posted mixed fiscal fourth-quarter , missing analysts' estimates on the bottom line. Costco (NASDAQ: ) reported of $2.25, below the estimate consensus from Investing.com of $2.54 a share, on revenue of about $47.5 billion, slightly above estimates of $47.48 billion. Comparable sales for the fourth quarter were 5.1%., led by strong growth in the U.S. of 6.2% This year’s fourth quarter was negatively impacted by a $123 million pre-tax reserve to selling, general and administrative expenses, Costco (NASDAQ: ) said.

NewsBreak: Costco Falls on Mixed Q4 Results
